Derivatives and Hedging: other comprehensive income loss cash flow hedge gain loss after reclassification and tax parent
Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax portion attributable to parent
Other OCI: other comprehensive income cumulative effect of change in accounting principle net of taxes
other comprehensive income defined benefit plans adjustment net of tax portion attributable to parent
other comprehensive income loss financial liability fair value option after tax and reclassification adjustment attributable to parent
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income available for sale securities adjustment net of tax period increase decrease
other comprehensive income loss available for sale securities adjustment net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: cumulative adjustment for accounting change consolidation of variable interest entities
cumulative effect of initial adoption of credit related notes
tax cuts and jobs act of2017 reclassification from aoci to retained earnings tax effect

Exercise of Stock Options: stock options exercised including income tax benefits vesting of restricted stock units and other shares
Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value employee benefit plan
stock issued during period value exchangeof stock
stock issued during period value new issues
stock issued during period value preferred new issues and warrants
stock issued during period value warrants exercised and exchange of preferred stock
Stock-Based Compensation: shares issued value share based payment arrangement after forfeiture and other

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period value
stock repurchased and retired during period value
__unmapped__: stock converted from one class to another class changes shares
stock issued during period shares employee benefit plan
stock issued during period shares new issues
stock issued during period shares share based compensation
stock issued during period shares warrants exercised and exchange of preferred stock
stock repurchased and retired during period shares
